title: The compleat courtier: or, The morals of the famous historian Cornelius Tacitus concerning flattery, &c. In above one hundred essays. Paraphras'd and illustrated with useful observations by the Sieur Amelo de la Houssaie and M. D'Ablancourt. Done out of French.
author: Tacitus, Cornelius.
publisher: Printed, and are to be sold by E. Rumball, at the Post-house in Russel-street in Covent-Garden,
notes: Published in 1687 with the title: The modern courtier.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
